items.name: Pichu
items.desc: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

items.name: Pikachu
items.desc: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

items.name: Riachu
items.desc: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
